text: ## Invitation Letter-Website: http://www.aeim2021.org  AEIM2021 is pleasure to announce the International Conference on Advanced Education and Information Management, which will be held in Shanghai, China during March 29-30, 2021. It aims to be the premier international forum for Advanced Education and Information Management focused researchers, practitioners and industry specialists to present and discuss the latest accomplishments, challenges, and future directions. AEIM2021 will feature invited speeches, paper presentations and social networking event. It welcomes submission of abstracts and research papers concerning any branch of Advanced Education and Information Management and participation of anyone who are interested in the related fields. Abstracts and papers submitted to AEIM2021 will be subject to a double-blind peer review. Participants with no submission could join as a listener. ## Publication All accepted papers will be published on the Journal Series of Advances in Social Science, Education and Humanities Research with ISSN: 2352-5398, ISBN and DOI. Atlantis Press will also submit all the papers to be indexed in CPCI (part of Clarivate's Web of Science), CNKI, Wanfang Data and Google Scholar.
